p: Zhang et al. [ 29] determined the processes and mechanisms of intestinal absorption of capilliposide B and C from Lysimachia capillipes Hemsl. Mechanisms involve processes such as facilitated passive diffusion, efflux transporters, and enzyme-mediated metabolism. Both capilliposides were suggested to be substrates of P-glycoprotein and multidrug resistance-associated protein 2. Capilliposide B may interact with the CYP3A4 system.
